attributes.action: A majority of The British People have no confidence in The Prime Minister
attributes.additional_details: A majority of The British People have no confidence in The Prime Minister  Boris Johnson and his cabinet we ask the Conservative Party to remove him as PM appoint a new cabinet
attributes.background: A majority of The British People have no confidence in The Prime Minister  Boris Johnson and his cabinet we ask the Conservative Party to remove him as PM appoint a new cabinet

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments. This includes calling for Ministers or MPs to be sacked, resign, or to be subject to a recall vote or a vote of no confidence.
